targets.query:
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesReceived"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesSent"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesReceived"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesSent"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT non_negative_difference(last(cumulative_sum)) FROM (
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesReceived"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT non_negative_difference(last(cumulative_sum)) FROM (
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesSent"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesReceived"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT non_negative_difference(last(cumulative_sum)) FROM (
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesSent"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesReceived"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT non_negative_difference(last(cumulative_sum)) FROM (
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("NewBytesSent"))) 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'internet/connection/dsl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fritzbox_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'receiverate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fritzbox_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'downstreammax' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fritzbox_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'sendrate' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fritzbox_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'upstreammax' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
